biography: Pamela Adlon (née Segall; born July 9, 1966) is an American actress, screenwriter, producer, and director. She voiced Bobby Hill on the animated comedy series King of the Hill (1997–2010), for which she won a Primetime Emmy Award, Ashley Spinelli on the animated comedy series Recess (1997–2003), and the title character from the Pajama Sam video game series. Adlon is also known for her roles on the comedy-drama series Californication (2007–2014) and Louie (2010–2015), on which she was also a writer and producer. Since 2016, she has been starring as Sam Fox on the FX comedy-drama series Better Things, which she also co-created, writes, produces and directs.
name: Pamela Adlon
